A program of TechSoup, Helping  Non Profit, Community Organizations, Charitable  Agencies and Other NGO's overcome their greatest struggles obstacles and roadblocks by providing tools, technology, information training and support in a live event setting.

Next Generation Artificial Intelligence, Sentient Software Systems.This is a new Technology, It will be unveiled to the public for the first time on Sunday July 31st at the 2016 Extraordinary Science and Technology Conference sponsored by TeslaTech.Beginning with the advent of its release, the world of data will never be the same. Not just Big Data but ALL DATA. Right now anyone can scan or upload images into a computer, the end resultis an exact copy in image form, just like making a photocopy on a copier.Your system can not tell what information is displayed, who the author was,what the topic of the content is etc, minimal ability to filter, crop orcopy the information exists but that is it. IWR DRMS (Intelligent Word Recognition Data Redirection Management Systems)can. Artificially intelligent, not only can it read, but also to understandthe data it has read. It accurately translates into digital format eachaspect of this data, where it is searchable and populates the data into thelanguage used by the device calling for it.IWR DRMS has the following functions as part of its core: . Cognizant Recognition and Understanding of (so far) 72 languages . Handwriting Recognition. The ability to translate and display data. Convert handwriting into digital text. Recognition of image data, such as tables, elements, algorithms, etc. . Data converion into digital counterparts. Self Creation of Databases. Recognize Label and Replicate according to Author, User, Keynotes, Topicand Content by established protocols. Direct Data into one or more locations, systems platforms as indicated bythe user . Adapt to User Specific TerminologiesIt understand the context of data presented, learns from it, adapts, andinforms users when information indicate a mistake has been made. Ongoingevolution, increases its capacity!

Virtual Reality, Continental Circuits Electrical Test, I designed and built from hand the hardware which had to be custom created for each circuit board developed.  This hardware tested by batch for open closed and short circuits and used to validate the function of each batch and type of circuit boards for everything from phones to 8k wrap. Custom Mapping of requirements developed on photo plastics c39, UV Bump for Imagry, Brown Vinegar Developer Clean Room, (for creation of map) Machine Drill Maps (programmed specs into system drive for computerized equipment drilling of boards to be wired creation of the frame to be wired) overlay gold peg mapping with drilled base, insertion of 24k gold pins sometimes in excess of 20000 of them. then wire all the connections together and insert into system as hardware to complete the batch testing of custom circuit boards.  My projects had to be exact with very narrow margin for error, Mistakes could result in thousands of dollars batch rebuild

American Hydrogen AssociationAssisted in the demolition of the first hydrogen powered car.  Development had already been well established before my induction, instead I got to help blow it lol.  It was a public demonstration of the safety of hydrogen in as a combustable fuel source.  While extremely volitile it is also extremely light, even when compressed to a liquid upon implode it is already well into the sky, burning yes, but well and away from the occupants. No Heat, No Smoke. I am now 39, I worked on this project at the age of 15.  So why are we still so dependent on fossil fuels.  A conscious mind must consider then the equation that the  dependency is by the choice of those with the power to choose.

summary: "Knowledge is power and Erin is powerful...Dr.F"​I am a happy outgoing person, passionate and driven to succeed in all aspects of life. Professionally I have a photographic memory and am able to retain and repeat pretty much anything. I love to learn and absorb information like a sponge; because of this and working in multiple industries that deal with multiple industries, I am able to bring valuable information to pretty much any table."I have a special nickname for Erin, around here, we just call her Google.  When there is something you really need to know or want to learn about, we just call Erin.  Enter the right keywords and wha lah all this information just comes pouring out.  I dont know how she does it, but she does, and I for one am glad" Norlan Parkis
